text: Bernard George Davis (December 11, 1906 - August 28, 1972) was an American publishing executive. He and William Bernard Ziff Sr. founded Ziff Davis Inc. in 1927. In 1957, he sold his ownership share of Ziff-Davis to William Ziff Jr., and left to found Davis Publications Inc. ==References== ==External links== *"Ziff Davis Corporate Timeline."
